Name: Revelation of the Far Sea
Description: An epic weapon in the Frost Mage. Forged by upgrading <color=#ef8e60>Abyssal Frost Staff</color>, this weapon can be further enhanced in future seasons using a small amount of Glinting Stellar Core.
Description2:
"Between the sea's breaths lies an untold truth.
It carves verses into the surging waves, writing them upon moonlit waters.
The tip of the staff catches a fleeting ripple, turning it into light.
Light pierces the mist, reaching even the deepest longing.
If you're willing to listen, the sea will offer you its answer."
(Excerpt from "Book of the Depths II")
